LanguageData.Deer.label: deer
LanguageData.Deer.description: A medium-sized herding herbivore which prefers to live in mixed forests and plains. Deer are very quick.
LanguageData.Deer.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Deer.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Deer.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Deer.tools.4.label: antlers
LanguageData.Deer_Leather.label: deer leather
LanguageData.Deer_Corpse.label: deer corpse
LanguageData.Ibex.label: ibex
LanguageData.Ibex.description: The wild ancestor of the domesticated goat. Ibexes live on marginal territory where most antelopes couldn't survive, eating lichens and sparse mountain plants. They're famous for dextrously hopping across bare cliff faces - and for their violent ramming attack.
LanguageData.Ibex.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Ibex.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Ibex.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Ibex.tools.4.label: antlers
LanguageData.Ibex_Leather.label: ibex leather
LanguageData.Ibex_Corpse.label: ibex corpse
LanguageData.Elk.label: elk
LanguageData.Elk.description: A moose or elk is a larger member of the deer family. It is well-adapted to life in cold climates.
LanguageData.Elk.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Elk.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Elk.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Elk.tools.4.label: antlers
LanguageData.Elk_Leather.label: elk leather
LanguageData.Elk_Corpse.label: elk corpse
LanguageData.Caribou.label: caribou
LanguageData.Caribou.description: A large member of the deer family, well-adapted to life in cold climates. Caribou can be milked, but refuse to carry packs.
LanguageData.Caribou.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Caribou.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Caribou.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Caribou.tools.4.label: antlers
LanguageData.Caribou_Leather.label: caribou leather
LanguageData.Caribou_Corpse.label: caribou corpse
LanguageData.WildBoar.label: wild boar
LanguageData.WildBoar.description: This hairy omnivore is descended from escaped pigs and evolved for living in the wild.\n\nIts tusks make it a better fighter than its domesticated pig cousins. Unfortunately, it is too unruly to be trained in the most complex tasks.
LanguageData.WildBoar.tools.0.label: tusk
LanguageData.WildBoar.tools.1.label: tusk
LanguageData.WildBoar.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.WildBoar_Leather.label: wild boar leather
LanguageData.WildBoar_Corpse.label: wild boar corpse
LanguageData.Tortoise.label: tortoise
LanguageData.Tortoise.description: This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite. Because of its natural armor, it is tough to kill and can do serious damage during drawn-out melee fights.
LanguageData.Tortoise.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Tortoise_Leather.label: tortoise leather
LanguageData.Tortoise_Corpse.label: tortoise corpse
